document_data.name: Roe
document_data.mainbody: '''Roe''' was a male [[human]] Watch lieutenant of the city of [[Neverwinter]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Roe was the lieutenant of the Watch.
document_data.History: Roe was Neverwinter Watch's lieutenant. He served the Watch with a great loyalty. If the Kalach-Cha sided with the watch, Roe would eventually die in a fire at the [[city guardhouse]] made by [[Moire]].
